author: tvolkert
msg: Optimized blur operation to not reflect paint updates after the window has been disabled.  It now creates the blurredImage once and caches it for use as long as the window is blurred.

author: gkbrown
msg: Eliminate Container.Attribute class and replace with strongly-typed attached properties and events.

author: tvolkert
msg: Updated to use the Bean API for styles

author: tvolkert
msg: removed MARGIN_ATTRIBUTE of TablePane, and converted TablePaneSkin to use the new Bean architecture
